text: Amanda Jacqueline Redman (born 12 August 1957) is a British actress. She was born in Brighton. Redman's movie roles include Deedee Dove in Sexy Beast. Her television roles include At Home with the Braithwaites and New Tricks. Redman's aunt was actress Joyce Redman (1915-2012). Redman married actor Robert Glenister (born 1960) in 1984. Their daughter Emily Glenister was born in 1987. The couple divorced in 1992. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Sussex Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Entertainers from Brighton Category:1957 births Category:Living people
title: Amanda Redman
